name: title
description: Displays a title command to all players.

options.name: title_text
options.description: The text to display in the main title.

options.name: subtitle_text
options.description: The text to display in the subtitle.

options.name: title_color
options.description: The color of the main title text.

options.name: subtitle_color
options.description: The color of the subtitle text.

options.name: length
options.description: How long (in seconds) to display the title (maximum of 15 seconds).
